item.title: Tweet
item.description: Went to @cineworld Ely last week. We told they couldn’t vend coffee into my reusable cup, they’d only put it in their disposable paper cup, and that I’d have to pour it in myself. They even insisted on putting the disposable lid on! #wasters ‚ù§Ô∏è 1 | üîÉ 0
